articles.title: Canada: 12 diners sent to hospital from likely aconite poisoning
articles.description: Aconite, also known as Devil's Helmet, is a common garden plant that can be lethal if ingested.

articles.title: Sarah Palin loses election to represent Alaska in Congress
articles.description: Democrat Mary Peltola will become the first Native American to represent Alaska in Congress.
articles.content: Ms Palin, 58, rose to prominence as a vice-presidential candidate in 2008. She has since become a key Trump ally.
